content:
Vaayum naakkum vaakkum cher-nnorellaa perum
Chollereedum mariyaami-nnekenam bhaagyam
/tdhanyathayerum-nin kedaaratthil
/taamodatthin-kathirundaayathinaal
Rathhamavallavallude jaanukkall-naalum chakrangall
Rakshakane than kukshiyilangettoll bhaagyavathi.
/thaaleluyyaa-thal praarththhana abhayam.
